extends java.lang.Object

      • EasyGui

        public EasyGui(int width,
       int height)
        Constructs a new GUI with a graphics panel of the given width and height.
        Parameters:
        width - Width of the graphics panel.
        height - Height of the graphics panel.

    • Method Detail

      • addLabel

        public final int addLabel(int row,
           int col,
           java.lang.String text)
        Adds a label to the given row and column in the GUI. The label shows the given text.
        Parameters:
        row - The row in which to place the label.
        col - The column in which to place the label.
        text - The text to be shown.
        Returns:
        The integer ID of the label.

      • addTextField

        public final int addTextField(int row,
               int col,
               java.lang.String text)
        Adds a text field to the given row and column in the GUI. The text field will initially show the given text. Use an empty String (i.e. "") to create a blank text field.
        Parameters:
        row - The row in which to place the text field.
        col - The column in which to place the text field.
        text - The initial text.
        Returns:
        The integer ID of the text field.

      • addButton

        public final int addButton(int row,
            int col,
            java.lang.String label,
            java.lang.Object obj,
            java.lang.String methodName)
        Adds a button to the given row and column in the GUI.
        Parameters:
        row - The row in which to place the button.
        col - The column in which to place the button.
        label - The button label.
        obj - An instance of the class containing the method that is to be called when the button is pressed.
        methodName - The name of the method to be called.
        Returns:
        The integer ID of the button.

        public final void setLabelText(int labelId,
                java.lang.String newText)
        Sets (or changes) the label of the label specified by its ID.
        Parameters:
        labelId - The ID of the label of which the text is to be set.
        newText - The new text to be displayed.
